value.mermaid:
erDiagram
    customers {
        UUID customer_id PK
        TEXT customer_name
        JSONB contact_info
    }
    suppliers {
        UUID supplier_id PK
        TEXT supplier_name
        JSONB contact_info
    }
    products {
        UUID product_id PK
        TEXT product_name
        NUMERIC unit_price
    }
    orders {
        UUID order_id PK
        UUID customer_id FK
        TIMESTAMP order_date
        TEXT order_status
    }
    order_items {
        UUID order_item_id PK
        UUID order_id FK
        UUID product_id FK
        INTEGER quantity
        NUMERIC unit_price
    }
    purchase_orders {
        UUID purchase_order_id PK
        UUID supplier_id FK
        TIMESTAMP order_date
        TEXT order_status
    }
    purchase_order_items {
        UUID purchase_order_item_id PK
        UUID purchase_order_id FK
        UUID product_id FK
        INTEGER quantity
        NUMERIC unit_price
    }
    quotes {
        UUID quote_id PK
        UUID supplier_id FK
        TIMESTAMP quote_date
        TIMESTAMP valid_until
    }
    quote_items {
        UUID quote_item_id PK
        UUID quote_id FK
        UUID product_id FK
        INTEGER quantity
        NUMERIC unit_price
    }
    inventory {
        UUID inventory_id PK
        UUID product_id FK
        INTEGER stock_quantity
    }
    ai_agents_log {
        UUID log_id PK
        TEXT agent_type
        TIMESTAMP log_time
        TEXT log_message
        UUID related_order_id FK
        UUID related_purchase_order_id FK
        UUID related_quote_id FK
    }
    customers ||--o{ orders : places
    orders ||--o{ order_items : contains
    products ||--o{ order_items : included_in
    suppliers ||--o{ purchase_orders : receives
    purchase_orders ||--o{ purchase_order_items : contains
    products ||--o{ purchase_order_items : included_in
    suppliers ||--o{ quotes : provides
    quotes ||--o{ quote_items : contains
    products ||--o{ quote_items : included_in
    products ||--o{ inventory : has
    orders ||--o{ ai_agents_log : tracked_by
    purchase_orders ||--o{ ai_agents_log : tracked_by
    quotes ||--o{ ai_agents_log : tracked_by
